title: [BUG] Weird error when i try to instantiate a SKBitmap
body:
**Description**

When i instantiate a SKBitmap send me this error: 

System.TypeInitializationException: 'Se produjo una excepción en el inicializador de tipo de 'SkiaSharp.SKImageInfo'.'

BadImageFormatException: Se ha intentado cargar un programa con un formato incorrecto. (Excepción de HRESULT: 0x8007000B)

**Code**

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5378163/72958143-fa261a80-3d84-11ea-8b10-c0a68b56078f.png)

width and height are 256.

**Basic Information**

I am using Eto.forms on Windows.
IDE Visual Studio Community 2019 16.5 Preview
netstandar2.0
SkiaSharp 1.68.0

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5378163/72958225-4bcea500-3d85-11ea-80bd-4ebeb130e97e.png)
